more.requirement: As our Commis Cook, you will be responsible for the preparation and checking of food, and assisting the Sous Chef / Junior Sous Chef wherever possible. Your key responsibilities will include: - To work within an assigned section and ensure it runs efficiently and productively - To provide warm, welcoming service without compromise to all guests - Ensure all food produced is in line with kitchen recipes and standards - Prepare and cook all food orders with a sense of urgency
more.description: • Professional working environment • Attractive benefits that will be discuss directly during the interview
more.benefit: - Fluent in English and confident speaking skills - Positive working attitude and customer-centric You will also bring with you a passion for service, excellent organisational skills as well as communication skills, be results orientated with a dedication to exceeding customer expectations. Previous experience in a five-star environment is desirable, and above all else, pride yourself on ability to build relationships and guest experiences, style and sophistication.
more.keyword: Giao tiếp hiệu quả,Kỹ năng chăm sóc khách hàng,Kỹ năng giải quyết tình huống,Tinh thần trách nhiệm,Tập trung trong công việc,Chịu được áp lực công việc,Trung thực,Tự tin,Nhiệt tình,Tinh thần làm việc nhóm
